data.actual_result: The scrolling stops. The scrolling shouldn't stop because the role header is a no-scroll area because when when trying to scroll with intertia but lifting the finger at the role header, the list doesn't scroll.
data.short_description: When scrolling with intertia in the member list and clicking on the role header, the scrolling stops.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server. - Scroll the members list with inertia. - Click on the role header.
